overview: In an apartment building, Wayne is dating Darlene.  Wayne's dad Bernie is fooling around with Darlene's mom Joyce.  Darlene's dad Hal is fooling around with Wayne's mom Stella.  Inevitably, everyone finds out about everything, and the jealousy kicks in to high gear.
tagline: oooh baby! Thought You'd Never Ask!
title: Thought You'd Never Ask
